Sometimes that we to pause during execution to do some debugging.

node inspect path/to/file.js

const anagrams = (strA, strB) => cleanStr(strA) === cleanStr(strB);

const cleanStr = str =>
  str
    .replace(/[^\w]/g, '')
    .toLowerCase()
    .split('')
    .sort()
    .join('');
